Hello! I am Guan Gui, a data science and biostatistics student with a passion for uncovering insights from complex biomedical data. I am currently pursuing my ScM in Biostatistics at Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health. I enjoy exploring new data science methods and their applications in public health.
